Projects

    Texas Method Program Generator

    The Texas Method is a strength training program that manipulates the individual’s training variables (volume and intensity) to increase gains on a weekly basis. This app generates next week’s training numbers depending on the user’s difficulty in the previous week and graphs each week’s five rep max to show strength progression.

    Example GitHub
      The Open Movie Database

      Web app created using jQuery to make ajax requests to the Open Movie Database API. The user can search for specific or random movies. The "Find Random Movies" button displays movies in increments of ten and loads another ten when the user scrolls to the bottom of the page. Clicking on a movie displays more information about the movie.

      Example GitHub
        Newsweek Clone

        Fully responsive clone of the website Newsweek using Twitter’s Bootstrap framework.

        Example GitHub
        Remote Linux Video Player

        A Linux server that accepts a string from a remote client containing a download URL to a video file. If the file already exists locally then it plays the video full screen using OpenCV. If the file does not exist then it downloads the video first.

        GitHub
        Microcontroller Handheld Game

        A handheld game developed on a Tiva C 32-bit microcontroller interfaced to multiple peripherals. The object of the game is to avoid being hit by flying asteroids. Each sprite’s pixel data was encoded in an 8-bit color palette lookup table to significantly reduce the memory size.

        GitHub
